ai-patthana23.29:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana23.29:2.1_0: or an adept’s teaching, or no cause or condition.
ai-patthana23.29:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.29:3.1_2: the five hindrances are not clear.
